price: 3. En verdad, en los cielos y en la tierra hay pruebas (del poder de Al-lah) para quienes creen.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: inna fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi laāyātin lil'mu'minīna
